description:
EarthBound is a contemporary-themed JRPG. Take four psychically-endowed children
across the world in search of 8 Melodies to defeat Giygas, the cosmic evil.

earthboundap3.4.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 3.4 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Easy Combat``: Automatically halves all enemy levels
* ``Randomize Enemy Stats``: Randomizes base stats and level of enemies, before scaling
* ``Randomize Enemy Attacks``: Randomizes which attacks enemy use and their attack pattern
* ``Randomize Enemy Attributes``: Randomizes properties of enemies, including appearance, name, and weaknesses.
* ``Randomize Fanfares`` was split into a choice and gained the option to remove Sound Stone melodies from the randomized fanfares
## Changes ##
* All instances of " " in new scripts changed to “ ” for consistency with the original game's writing
* The HHV carpet is now randomized when shops are set to local filler
* Ness's double PP boost is now tied to the Power of the Earth rather than Ness's Nightmare
* The Photo Man in stonehenge has been entirely removed
* Reflected attacks that hit Giygas will now hit the assistant instead of the player
* Monkey's Love is now Useful instead of Filler
* The Monkey Caves are no longer a shuffled dungeon
* Ness is automatically added to the party during the Epilogue
* Brickroad now always spawns outside the brickroad maze exit, along with a phone for saving
* Moonside and Saturn Valley shops now have appropriate dialogue for all shopsanity text
* added `é` to font
* Fixed a vanilla bug where attempting to give a stored item to someone who's inventory was full would override which item you were withdrawing from storage
* There is now special dialogue for anyone other than Ness attempting to use the bicycle
* You can now use the Bicycle in areas other than just Onett and Twoson (anywhere you can teleport)
## Fixes ##
* Fixed Progressive Equipment with Equipamizer not accounting for Poo's stat boost in sorting
* Fixed Poo PSI again
* Fixed Carbon Dog's transformation not scaling with Carbon dog, and instead Diamond Dog always scaling with carbon
* Fixed an exceedingly rare crash when editing a file only when 2 files were present
* Fixed being unable to delete duplicate unsellable non-key items using storage
* Fixed the post-giygas scene adding a photograph at coordinates 0,0
* Fixed a crash when starting with Poo PSI
* Fixed PSI/teleports being set to the starting inventory if they were for another player and poo was the starter char
* Fixed the two Summers bracelets having incorrect armorizer descriptions
* A random Pokey no longer spawns in HHV after beating Carpainter with dungeon shuffle on
* Fixed(?) very specific Lumine Hall messages cutting off
* Fixed Progressive equipment getting deleted if you received one while storage is full
* Fixed the Tenda Chief receiving items
* Fixed Starting Inventory always going to Ness with remote items off
* Fixed Poo not getting any stat changes from randomized equipment
## Known Issues ##
* None so far
earthboundap3.4.title: Archipelago EarthBound 3.4

earthboundap3.5.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 3.5 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Nonlocal Items use Local Presents``:  If Presents Match Contents is enabled, this causes items for other players to use the original present tiers (trashcan, present, and chest) instead of boxes with the Archipelago logo.
## Changes ##
* You now receive the Gutsy Bat as a Progressive Bat
* The party's facing direction is now reset properly after buying a local Photo from a shop or using the Gifting menu
* New flavors [``Lavender, Apple, Orange, Toilet``]
* Starting with teddy bears (including starting as Paula) will now have them appear in the party properly
* Randomized enemies can no longer base their stats on bosses
## Fixes ##
* Fixed an extra pause in dialogue when Poo was on an NPC
* Randomized Elemental armor can no longer have duplicate names
* Fixed Progressive Weapons + prefixed items off giving you a Broken Antenna instead of the Moon Beam Gun
* Fixed a gen crash when cave boys were shuffled over an enemy that had npc versions of it
* Fixed a lady blocking the back of the cafe when dungeons were shuffled
* Fixed a bug where truffle locations would say "you had no room" even if it was an item that didn't require inventory space (or was a photograph)
* Fixed Brickroad's phone making you forget how to call mom
* Fixed the You Won text occasionally being left-aligned
* Fixed Pokey appearing in HHV with shuffled dungeons again
* Fixed the game crashing when Giygas reflects stuff
## Known Issues ##
* Progressive elemental armor might not have the right resistance?
* hint men are drunk
earthboundap3.5.title: Archipelago EarthBound 3.5

earthboundap4.0.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.0 #
## New Settings ##
* N/A
## Changes ##
* The Warp Pad is now usable even if Jeff is paralyzed or dead
* Photographs in the end credits will now *attempt* to use a palette that is appropriate for the area where the photo was taken. Not all areas have an appropriate palette, but for those that do it will use it
* The person who defeats Master Barf will now be the correct character if the character is for another player
* Equipamizer item prices have been overhauled and tuned better. Now prices are more reasonable and correlate to the item's value better (taking into account all of the combined attributes of it)
## Fixes ##
* Photographs are now probably less likely to freeze the game if received in areas with lots of NPCs
* Fixed weird text when receiving a teleport on the Threed Zombie Prisoner
* Fixed one of the progressive equipamized bats not being right
* Fixed the photo guy turning invisible after getting a photo in some spots
* Fixed hints giving you the hint for the previous shop you were at if you couldnt afford or chose not to get the hint
* Fixed enemized attacks not scaling breathe fire
* Something with the sky runner again probably
* Fixed Lavapants blank name
* Fixed enemies brushing their teeth with a null
* Fixed Equipamizer equipment not using the correct elemental resistance
* Fixed Nova Missiles having glitch text when used
## Known Issues ##
* None so far
earthboundap4.0.title: Archipelago EarthBound 4.0

earthboundap4.0.1.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.0.1 #
## New Settings ##
* N/A
## Changes ##
* N/A
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the Post-Moonside delivery cutscene sending the check before the cutscene finished when Dungeon Shuffle was on
* Fixed an issue where generating with multiple EarthBound games could crash gen with large multiworlds
## Known Issues ##
* Weaponized weapons can rarely have duplicated names
earthboundap4.0.1.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.0.1

earthboundap4.1.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.1 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Money Weight``: Weight for money to be placed as a filler item.
*`` Map Palette Shuffle``: Shuffles Map palettes, with 3 selectable pools for how good the resulting palette is.
    -NOTE: This is not fully implemented, and most indoor maps (and some outdoor) are not shuffled yet.
    -NOTE: Some maps in some pools do not have many or any usable palettes, and may always use their original palette. This is separate from the partial implementation above.
## Changes ##
* The game will now display a Fatal Error screen if the game crashes instead of the anti-piracy screen
* Mysterious Electric field scaling is now a bit more consistent
* Shop hints are no longer sent out constantly
* Paralyzing Pollen is now scaled with Enemizer
* Enemies no longer get boosted HP per logical character if Easy Combat is enabled
* Enemizer now uses appropriate values for Guts and Luck
* Cultists in the Happy-Happy HQ now disappear when talked to if you respawn them
* Tweaked level scaling, and enemies now gain 10% hp per character instead of 25%
* Area levels are now listed in the spoiler log
* A sparkle sprite is now present in the Fourside and Moonside cafe to indicate that the warp between them is active.
* Happy-Happy Village's color is now restored after you defeat Carpainter
* Weaponized weapons now have a minimum of 10 offense if progressive weapons is enabled
## Fixes ##
* Fixed a couple locations not being part of any groups
* Fixed a bug where starting as Poo and having the Starting Item be for someone else could give Poo a fake item
* Fixed Snow Wood Boarding School never being scaled correctly
* Moonside is now considered logical ATM access
* Fixed Summers equipamized items not being double price
* Fixed Rainy Circle being triggerable twice
* Fixed some Loaded Dice not being enemized
* Fixed Poison Spores being scaled in reverse
* Fixed some flags (notably the ladder in saturn valley) getting unset when calling Escargo Express
* Fixed duplicate Equipamizer names
* Fixed a bug with Enemizer where some enemies could revert to their original Attributes
* Fixed a bug where enemies that call other enemies could occasionally be corrupted visually
## Known Issues ##
* It’s possible there might still be some visual corruption when enemies call other enemies, if there is, let me know. It is assumed fixed unless it happens again.
earthboundap4.1.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.1

* Cultists in the Happy-Happy HQ now disappear when talked to if you respawn them

earthboundap4.1.1.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.1.1

earthboundap4.1.2.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.1.2 #
## New Settings ##
* N/A
## Changes ##
* N/A
## Fixes ##
* Fixed some very minor garbage text when buying equipment from shops that don't normally sell equipment
* Fixed slight weirdness with the Bike shop check dialogue
* Fixed a softlock if Happy-Happy village's saved palette was happy-happy village's unsaved palette
* Fixed the Monkey Caves shop sending out shopsanity checks for an Onett store
* Fixed money not generating on shop checks if remote items was set to true
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.1.2.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.1.2

earthboundap4.1.3.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.1.3 #
## New Settings ##
* N/A
## Changes ##
* Some areas only used for logic calculation no longer display their level in the spoiler log
* There is now a new NPC in the Sky Runner cavern that will teleport you back to Andonuts' Lab after using the Sky Runner. The Sky Runner still allows Bubble Monkey to transport you across the lake, as before
* It is no longer possible to receive key items through gifting (No games could send them, this is in anticipation of Minecraft gifting)
* Several more maps have been implemented for Map Palette Shuffle. However, the feature is still not fully completed.
## Fixes ##
* Fixed a bug where some status-related variables in battle could become glitched in certain specific circumstances if Paralysis Lambda failed
* Buying equipment from shops that don't normally sell equipment now also have proper text if Shop randomizer is set to local filler
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.1.3.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.1.3

earthboundap4.2.1.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.1 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
N/A
## Fixes ##
* Fixed Apple Kid's invention having weird text
* Fixed an npc in Belch's Factory not using the proper text to refer to the boss
* Fixed an artifact tile in some cutscenes like the magic cake
* Fixed a bug where using PSI against enemies that called other enemies into battle would cause sprite corruption
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.1.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.1

earthboundap4.2.2r2.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.2 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* New Flavors: [Lemonade, Garlic]
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the PSI Fakeout attack not using a proper attack name
* Fixed scripting issues when receiving your own money on some PSI locations
* Updated the description of Monkey Caves: Shop to reflect the fact it is now an actual shop instead of the minor item bundle
* Fixed uncommon and rare filler equipment being changed to the common equipment pool if the generator places too much progressive gear
* Fixed/added some item categories
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.2r2.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.2

earthboundap4.2.3.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.3 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* Start inventory stuff adjusted. May work on 0.6.1 again, but untested
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the monkey cave shop option text
* Fixed a bug where unknown circumstances could cause the Sky Runner to careen into the lake
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.3.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.3

earthboundap4.2.4.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.4 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
N/A
## Fixes ##
* Fixed a bug where generation would crash if it was set to ``spoiler_only``.  Area scaling cannot be properly calculated at this time unless output is generated.
* Fixed the Happy-Happy village teleporting not unlocking upon traveling there if Carpainter was previously defeated
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.4.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.4

earthboundap4.2.5.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.5 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* The Hint Man now offers to tell the server about items that other players can find for you. (NOTE: This feature only works on the 0.6.3 RC. You can still play on release 0.6.2, however, nothing will happen if he tries to tell the server about a location that isn't in your game, so you'll just waste $500.)
* PSI Caramel changed to Common instead of Uncommon (heals the same as the common magic tart)
## Fixes ##
* Fixed Meteornium not being in the filler pool
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.5.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.5

earthboundap4.2.6.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.6 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* Slightly adjusted area order for the spoiler log
## Fixes ##
* Fixed some garbage text during the epilogue when skip epilogue is enabled
* Fixed a bug where using the Tenda Lavapants in battle would delete them without doing anything
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.6.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.6

earthboundap4.2.7r2.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2.7 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* Added some new Weaponizer names
* Restructured some stuff internally for core release please test this
## Fixes ##
* Fixed the Safety Flag being left on after exiting Lumine Hall
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2.7r2.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2.7

earthboundap4.2r2.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.2 #
## New Settings ##
* ``Safe Final Boss``: Prevents specific annoying bosses (mainly those that use party-wide PSI or similar attacks) from being randomized onto Heavily Armed Pokey
## Changes ##
* Removed the initial phone call with Ness's mom; She will now cure homesickness the first time you call her and no longer redirects to Escargo Express
* **MAP PALETTE SHUFFLE IS NOW COMPLETE**, all maps now have shuffled palettes. Note that some maps, due to not looking very good when shuffled, have some/no palette changes. This, at this point, is intentional.
* Enemy Lifeup can no longer scale above Beta
## Fixes ##
* Fixed a bug where you would gain $1 upon dying if the one's digit of your money was odd
* Fixed more minor text bugs when buying shopsanity items
* PROBABLY* fixed some random and somewhat rare sprite corruption when buying your own photograph or sending/receiving gifts
* Fixed a lack of a line break when getting money for yourself from NPCs sometimes
* Fixed money on the dalaam throne check not despawning when collected
* Fixed some palette flag stuff breaking
* Fixed a bug where the Summers Museum guy wouldn't actually check if you had the Tiny Ruby if Poo was in the party
* Fixed PSI Blast/PSI missile not clearing that they were reflected causing attack weirdness
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.2r2.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.2(a)

earthboundap4.3.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.3 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
* Shattered Man now uses the proper overworld sprite
* Significantly overhauled Shopsanity price scaling to hopefully have a cleaner curve
* Buying or selling from a shop when shopsanity is on now displays the correct thankful text instead of the goodbye text
* The Onett Cop in Twoson now refers to the correct boss on the Captain Strong slot
* The Post-Carpainter Carpainter in Happy-Happy village now uses the appropriate boss sprite
* The Snow Wood Locker room checks were added to the Snow Wood boarding school location group
* Boss shuffle now supports Boss Plando
## Fixes ##
* Fixed a bug where you could get weird ambushes when starting as characters besides Ness
* Fixed Starman Junior having unscaled Freeze Alpha *and* a scaled freeze
* Fixed a bug where item names displayed while confirming a shopsanity purchase would be cut off earlier than intended
* Fixed a bug where Randomized Enemy Attacks wouldn't have the proper attack field over enemies that call other enemies
* Fixed Starmen summoned by Starmen Supers probably not being scaled correctly
* Fixed enemies summoned by other enemies being scaled even if Enemizer made them unable to summon anything
* Fixed the Magicant Stat Boost sometimes not giving the first boost to Ness if all 4 characters are in your party
* Fixed the Post-Belch shop not correctly checking for defeating Belch in dungeon ER logic
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.3.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.3

earthboundap4.3.1.description:
# EarthBound Archipelago Version 4.3.1 #
## New Settings ##
N/A
## Changes ##
N/A
## Fixes ##
* Fixed Giygas Phase 2 being affected by enemizer
* Fixed the credits *again*
* Fixed a generation crash involving ness, the monotoli building, and shuffled characters
* Fixed Boss shuffle plando not being able to shuffle and place bosses on vanilla slots
## Known Issues ##
* None so Far
earthboundap4.3.1.title: Archipelago EarthBound v4.3.1
